name: Wave Redux
description:
Experience a stunning geometric chill-game with Wave Redux, spiritual successor to the hit 2014 twitch game Wave Wave.

The wave is back and more mind-numbingly addictive than ever.
How far can you go?

• Peace out in 'Chill Mode' with calming obstacles and nice music.
• Turn up the heat in 'Hype Mode', with more challenging obstacles and a new control scheme.
